duties_responsibilities.duty: Select merchandise from sales floor to complete customer online orders.
Sorts and unloads selected merchandise into refrigeration, frozen, or dry storage holding areas.
Use a digital tool to select items necessary to complete online orders, pack and put away orders in the staging area, and retrieve orders for customers.
Make decisions on customers' behalf if requested item is unavailable.
Provide superior customer service, answer product-related questions, locate products, and help in-store Customers as needed.
Return extra/unwanted products to their proper in-store location.
Communicate continuously with department Managers and Partners to locate product.
Minimize shrink through careful handling of products.
Follow Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), achieve productivity standards.
Perform eStore Curbie duties as needed.
Comply with federal, state, and company regulations/standards for product freshness, food safety, and sanitation.
Gather baskets and pick up trash inside and outside eStore as needed.
Organize carts/maintain cleanliness within the eStore.
Maintain standards for safety and sanitation.

education_certification.credential: 3+ months of experience as a Curbie or related experience.
Completion of all required training upon hire (e.g., Alcohol Seller's Training)
